parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.74</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Tree View </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets picture to item selected by path. IDC means id of parent Tree View. Name is picture name. The picture is searched in the mission directory. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[tvSetPicture]] [idc, path, name] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] of [[Number]]s </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> name: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name> s2</name>=<value> control [[tvSetPicture]] [path, name] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] of [[Number]]s </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> name: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER23</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[tvSetPicture]] [101, [0], "picture"];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_ctrl [[tvSetPicture]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[0,0,0], [[getText]] ([[configFile]] >> "CfgWeapons" >> "optic_NVS" >> "picture")];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[tvAdd]], [[tvClear]], [[tvCollapse]], [[tvCount]], [[tvCurSel]], [[tvData]], [[tvDelete]], [[tvExpand]], [[tvPicture]], [[tvSetCurSel]], [[tvSetData]], [[tvSetValue]], [[tvSort]], [[tvSortByValue]], [[tvValue]], [[tvText]], [[tvSetText]], [[tvSetPictureColor]], [[tvSetPictureRight]], [[tvSetPictureRightColor]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
